name: sources from
description: Data origin - Asset A sources from Asset B means B provides data to A

name: transforms into
description: Data transformation - Asset A transforms into Asset B through processing

name: copies to
description: Data replication - Asset A is replicated to Asset B

name: aggregates
description: Rollup - Asset A combines multiple records into Asset B

name: derives from

name: extracts from

name: loads into

name: merges with

name: splits into

name: filters from
description: Filtering - Asset A is a filtered subset of Asset B

name: enriches

name: cleanses

name: validates

name: conflicts with
